__set_project()
set(__OUTPUT_NAME libpng16)
set(LIB_PREFIX ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/install/lib/${__OUTPUT_NAME})
set(LIB_R ${LIB_PREFIX}${AE_LIB_SUFFIX})
set(LIB_D ${LIB_PREFIX}d${AE_LIB_SUFFIX})
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY PROJECT_LIBPNG_NAME ${PROJECT_NAME})
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY PROJECT_LIBPNG_INCLUDE ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/install/include)
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY PROJECT_LIBPNG_LIB ${LIB_PREFIX}${AE_BUILD_TYPE_SUFFIX}${AE_LIB_SUFFIX})
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY PROJECT_LIBPNG_LIB_R ${LIB_R})
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY PROJECT_LIBPNG_LIB_D ${LIB_D})
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY PROJECT_LIBPNG_DLL ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/install/$<IF:$<PLATFORM_ID:Windows>,bin,lib>/${__OUTPUT_NAME}${AE_BUILD_TYPE_SUFFIX}${AE_DLL_SUFFIX})

get_property(PROJECT_ZLIB_NAME GLOBAL PROPERTY "PROJECT_ZLIB_NAME")
get_property(PROJECT_ZLIB_INCLUDE GLOBAL PROPERTY "PROJECT_ZLIB_INCLUDE")
get_property(PROJECT_ZLIB_LIB GLOBAL PROPERTY "PROJECT_ZLIB_LIB")

include(ExternalProject)

__create_external_project_cmake_args(__CMAKE_ARGS)

ExternalProject_Add(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}
    PREFIX ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
    GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/glennrp/libpng.git
    GIT_TAG v1.6.37
    GIT_SHALLOW 1
    GIT_PROGRESS 1
    GIT_CONFIG core.autocrlf=false
    TMP_DIR tmp
    STAMP_DIR stamp
    DOWNLOAD_DIR download
    INSTALL_DIR install
    SOURCE_DIR src
    BINARY_DIR ${AE_BUILD_DIR}
    UPDATE_COMMAND ""
    BUILD_BYPRODUCTS 
        ${LIB_R}
        ${LIB_D}
    CMAKE_ARGS
        -DPNG_BUILD_ZLIB=ON
        -DPNG_STATIC=OFF
        -DPNG_TESTS=OFF
        -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${PROJECT_ZLIB_INCLUDE}
        -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${PROJECT_ZLIB_LIB}
        ${__CMAKE_ARGS}
)

add_dependencies(${PROJECT_NAME} ${PROJECT_ZLIB_NAME})
set_property(TARGET ${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTY FOLDER ${AE_EXTERNAL_FOLDER_NAME})
